mapper.select:
SELECT a.OWNERNAME AS name,a.TELCODE AS telphone,a.OWNERCERTNUM AS idCard,b.recnumgather AS recnumgather,b.oppartnum AS oppartnum, a.optypenum AS optypenum,a.recyear AS recyear,a.recnum AS recnum FROM RWRECOWNER a , rwrecinfo b WHERE
instr(a.OWNERNAME||'-'||a.TELCODE||'-'||a.OWNERCERTNUM||'-'||b.recnumgather,#{name})>0 AND
a.optypenum = b.optypenum AND a.recyear=b.recyear AND a.recnum = b.recnum AND a.people_status=3 AND b.oppartnum=312

SELECT HOUSEID as houseId,SITNUMGATHER as sitnumGather, ARCHITAREA as architArea,ROOMAREA as roomArea,APPORTAREA as apportArea,SITUNITNUM as unitNum,SITDOORNUM as roomNum,(select name from tbdwarchitstruct where code=ARCHITSTRUCTCODE) as architStructcode FROM TBBWDIAGRAMHOUSE WHERE houseid=(SELECT houseId FROM RWRECRECEIVE WHERE optypenum=#{optypenum} AND recyear=#{recyear} AND recnum=#{recnum})

SELECT ID AS id,OPTYPENUM AS optypenum,RECYEAR AS recyear,RECNUM AS recnum,OPPARTNUM AS oppartnum,STARTTIME AS startTime, ENDTIME AS endTime,PRICE AS price,ANNUALREVIEW AS annualReview,NUMMONTH AS numMonth,OPRATIONID AS oprationId FROM CONTRACT WHERE optypenum=#{optypenum} AND recyear=#{recyear} AND recnum=#{recnum} AND ENDTIME > SYSDATE

select tb.ARCHITAREA as architArea,tb.SITBUILDNUM as buildNum,tb.SITUNITNUM as unitNum,tb.SITDOORNUM as roomNum,tb.architStructcode,bzf.address as projectAddress,bzf.name as projectName from (select tbh.ARCHITAREA as ARCHITAREA,tbh.SITUNITNUM as SITUNITNUM,tbh.SITDOORNUM as SITDOORNUM,tbh.architStructcode as architStructcode,tbb.BUILDIDTEMP as BUILDIDTEMP,tbb.SITBUILDNUM as SITBUILDNUM from (select BUILDID, ARCHITAREA,SITUNITNUM, SITDOORNUM, (select name from tbdwarchitstruct where code=ARCHITSTRUCTCODE) as architStructcode from TBBWDIAGRAMHOUSE where houseid= (select houseId from RWRECRECEIVE where optypenum=81 and recyear=2019 and recnum=520))tbh,TBBWDIAGRAMBUILD tbb where tbh.BUILDID=tbb.BUILDID)tb,BZF_PROJECT bzf where tb.BUILDIDTEMP = bzf.BUILD_RECEIVE
mapper.update: UPDATE CONTRACT SET OPTYPENUM = #{optypenum}, RECYEAR = #{recyear}, RECNUM = #{recnum}, OPPARTNUM = #{oppartnum}, STARTTIME = #{startTime}, ENDTIME = #{endTime}, PRICE = #{price}, ANNUALREVIEW = #{annualReview}, NUMMONTH = #{numMonth}, HOUSEID = #{houseId}, OPRATIONID = #{oprationId}, CREATETIME = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CONTRACT WHERE optypenum=#{optypenum} AND recyear=#{recyear} AND recnum=#{recnum} AND ENDTIME > SYSDATE
